summary.span: Represents a parameter to a and optionally its mapping to columns.

span.span: Represents a parameter to a and optionally its mapping to columns.

summary.span: For more information on parameters, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

span.span: For more information on parameters, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数名称不区分大小写。Parameter names are not case sensitive. > [!NOTE] > 无名称，也称为序号，参数不支持.NET Framework 数据提供程序为 SQL Server。Nameless, also called ordinal, parameters are not supported by the .NET Framework Data Provider for SQL Server. 有关详细信息，以及其他示例代码演示如何使用参数，请参阅[命令和参数](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/commands-and-parameters.md)。For more information, along with additional sample code demonstrating how to use parameters, see [Commands and Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/commands-and-parameters.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建的多个实例通过内的集合， 。The following example creates multiple instances of through the collection within the . 这些参数用于从数据源选择数据并将数据放。These parameters are used to select data from the data source and put the data in the . 此示例假定和已创建通过使用适当的架构、 命令和连接。This example assumes that a and a have already been created by using the appropriate schema, commands, and connection. 有关详细信息和使用参数的其他示例，请参阅[检索和修改 ADO.NET 中的数据](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-and-modifying-data.md)和[配置参数和参数数据类型](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md)。For more information and additional examples on using parameters, see [Retrieving and Modifying Data in ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/retrieving-and-modifying-data.md) and [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/configuring-parameters-and-parameter-data-types.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 当指定中`value`参数，从的 Microsoft.NET Framework 类型中推断出。When you specify an in the `value` parameter, the is inferred from the Microsoft .NET Framework type of the . 当你使用的此重载时要格外小心构造函数来指定整数参数值。Use caution when you use this overload of the constructor to specify integer parameter values. 因为此重载接受`value`类型的，必须将转换到的整数值键入时的值为零，如下面的 C# 示例所示。Because this overload takes a `value` of type , you must convert the integral value to an type when the value is zero, as the following C# example demonstrates. ``` Parameter = new SqlParameter("@pname", (object)0); ``` 如果不执行此转换，则编译器将认为你尝试调用`SqlParameter`(`string`， `SqlDbType`) 构造函数重载。If you do not perform this conversion, the compiler assumes that you are trying to call the `SqlParameter` (`string`, `SqlDbType`) constructor overload. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. summary.span: Enforces encryption of a parameter when using [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine).

span.span: Enforces encryption of a parameter when using [Always Encrypted](/sql/relational-databases/security/encryption/always-encrypted-database-engine).

summary.span: If SQL Server informs the driver that the parameter does not need to be encrypted, the query using the parameter will fail.

span.span: If SQL Server informs the driver that the parameter does not need to be encrypted, the query using the parameter will fail.

summary.span: This property provides additional protection against security attacks that involve a compromised SQL Server providing incorrect encryption metadata to the client, which may lead to data disclosure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Offset`属性用于客户端分块的二进制和字符串数据。The `Offset` property is used for client-side chunking of binary and string data. 例如，若要在服务器上的列中插入的文本的 10 MB，用户可能会执行的 1 MB 的区块，10 参数化的插入移动的值`Offset`1 MB 的每个迭代上。For example, in order to insert 10MB of text into a column on a server, a user might execute 10 parameterized inserts of 1MB chunks, shifting the value of `Offset` on each iteration by 1MB. `Offset` 指定的二进制类型的字节数和字符串的字符数。`Offset` specifies the number of bytes for binary types, and the number of characters for strings. 字符串的计数不包括结尾的字符。The count for strings does not include the terminating character. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数具有使用属性的`Decimal`。The property is used by parameters that have a of `Decimal`. 不需要指定的值和属性用于输入参数，因为它们可以根据参数值推断出。You do not need to specify values for the and properties for input parameters, as they can be inferred from the parameter value. `Precision` 和`Scale`需要针对输出参数和需要而不需要指示一个值，例如，具有特定的精度和小数位数指定 null 值指定为参数的完整元数据的方案。`Precision` and `Scale` are required for output parameters and for scenarios where you need to specify complete metadata for a parameter without indicating a value, such as specifying a null value with a specific precision and scale. > [!NOTE] > 不支持此属性将数据传递到数据库强制使用。Use of this property to coerce data passed to the database is not supported. 若要舍入、 截断，或者将其传递到数据库之前强制数据，使用类属于`System`之前将值分配给参数的命名空间`Value`属性。To round, truncate, or otherwise coerce data before passing it to the database, use the class that is part of the `System` namespace prior to assigning a value to the parameter's `Value` property. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft.NET Framework 数据提供程序附带.NET Framework 1.0 版不验证或的参数值。Microsoft .NET Framework data providers that are included with the .NET Framework version 1.0 do not verify the or of parameter values. 这会导致在数据源处插入的截断的数据。This can cause truncated data being inserted at the data source. 如果你使用的.NET Framework 1.0 版，验证和的之前设置参数值的值。If you are using .NET Framework version 1.0, validate the and of values before setting the parameter value. 如果当你使用.NET Framework 1.1 版或更高版本时，引发异常参数值设置为无效。When you use .NET Framework version 1.1 or a later version, an exception is thrown if a parameter value is set with an invalid . 值超出了参数的小数位数仍将被截断。 values that exceed the parameter scale are still truncated. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData SqlParameter.Precision Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.Precision Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData SqlParameter.Precision Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData SqlParameter.Precision Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 参数具有使用属性的`Decimal`。The property is used by parameters that have a of `Decimal`. > [!WARNING] > 数据可能会被截断，如果未显式指定属性和服务器上的数据不符合缩放 0 （默认值）。Data may be truncated if the property is not explicitly specified and the data on the server does not fit in scale 0 (the default). 不需要指定的值和属性用于输入参数，因为它们可以根据参数值推断出。You do not need to specify values for the and properties for input parameters, as they can be inferred from the parameter value. `Precision` 和`Scale`需要针对输出参数和需要而不需要指示一个值，例如，具有特定的精度和小数位数指定 null 值指定为参数的完整元数据的方案。`Precision` and `Scale` are required for output parameters and for scenarios where you need to specify complete metadata for a parameter without indicating a value, such as specifying a null value with a specific precision and scale. > [!NOTE] > 不支持此属性将数据传递到数据库强制使用。Use of this property to coerce data passed to the database is not supported. 若要舍入、 截断，或者将其传递到数据库之前强制数据，使用类属于`System`之前将值分配给参数的命名空间`Value`属性。To round, truncate, or otherwise coerce data before passing it to the database, use the class that is part of the `System` namespace prior to assigning a value to the parameter's `Value` property. > [!NOTE] > 附带.NET Framework 1.0 版的.NET framework 数据提供程序不验证或的参数值。.NET Framework data providers that are included with the .NET Framework version 1.0 do not verify the or of parameter values. 这会导致在数据源中要插入的截断的数据。This can cause truncated data to be inserted at the data source. 如果你使用的.NET Framework 1.0 版，验证和的之前设置参数值的值。If you are using .NET Framework version 1.0, validate the and of values before setting the parameter value. 值超出了参数的小数位数仍将被截断。 values that exceed the parameter scale are still truncated. ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. MemberSignature.Value: public override int Size { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Size
Public Overrides Property Size As Integer
public: virtual property int Size { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Size : int with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 列中的数据的最大大小（以字节为单位）。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 默认值将根据参数值进行推断。

span.span: The default value is inferred from the parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性; 不会影响返回值从存储过程的返回参数始终是固定大小的整数。Return values are not affected by this property; return parameters from stored procedures are always fixed-size integers. 对于使用可变长度的类型 (例如 nvarchar) 的输出参数，参数的大小定义保存输出参数的缓冲区的大小。For output parameters with a variable length type (nvarchar, for example), the size of the parameter defines the size of the buffer holding the output parameter. 输出参数可以截断为使用指定的大小。The output parameter can be truncated to a size specified with . 对于字符类型，使用指定大小是以字符为单位。For character types, the size specified with is in characters. 属性用于二进制和字符串类型。The property is used for binary and string types. 类型参数的`SqlType.String`，`Size`意味着以 Unicode 字符为单位的长度。For parameters of type `SqlType.String`, `Size` means length in Unicode characters. 类型参数的`SqlType.Xml`，`Size`将被忽略。For parameters of type `SqlType.Xml`, `Size` is ignored. 对于非字符串数据类型和 ANSI 字符串数据，属性引用的字节数。For nonstring data types and ANSI string data, the property refers to the number of bytes. 对于 Unicode 字符串数据，指的字符数。For Unicode string data, refers to the number of characters. 字符串的计数不包括结尾的字符。The count for strings does not include the terminating character. 对于可变长度数据类型，描述数据传输到服务器的最大数量。For variable-length data types, describes the maximum amount of data to transmit to the server. 例如，对于 Unicode 字符串值，无法用于限制发送到服务器以首先一百个字符的数据量。For example, for a Unicode string value, could be used to limit the amount of data sent to the server to the first one hundred characters. 如果未显式设置，其大小将被推断从指定的参数值的实际大小。If not explicitly set, the size is inferred from the actual size of the specified parameter value. 如果参数值的小数部分大于大小，则将截断值以匹配大小这一问题。If the fractional part of the parameter value is greater than the size, then the value will be truncated to match the size. 对于固定长度的值的数据类型，将被忽略。For fixed length data types, the value of is ignored. 它可以检索用于信息说明，并返回最大传输到服务器参数的值时，提供程序使用的字节数。It can be retrieved for informational purposes, and returns the maximum amount of bytes the provider uses when transmitting the value of the parameter to the server. 有关流式处理的信息，请参阅[SqlClient 流支持](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。For information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#5)]

A的`InputOutput`是这两者的组合。A of `InputOutput` is a combination of both. 有关如何使用属性，请参阅[DataAdapter 参数](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)和[使用 Dataadapter 更新数据源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md) and [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. summary.span: Sets or gets a value which indicates whether the source column is nullable.

span.span: Sets or gets a value which indicates whether the source column is nullable.

summary.span: This allows to correctly generate Update statements for nullable columns.

span.span: This allows to correctly generate Update statements for nullable columns.

value.span: 如果源列可以为 null;如果它不是。

span.span: if the source column is nullable; if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由时处理可以为 null 的列正确生成更新命令。 is used by the to correctly generate update commands when dealing with nullable columns. 通常，使用的限制为开发人员从继承。Generally, use of is limited to developers inheriting from . 使用此属性来确定源列是否可以为 null，并将此属性设置为`true`是否可以为 null，和`false`如果它不是。 uses this property to determine whether the source column is nullable, and sets this property to `true` if it is nullable, and `false` if it is not. 当是生成其 Update 语句，它将检查每个参数。When is generating its Update statement, it examines the for each parameter. 如果属性是`true`，生成 WHERE 子句，如下所示 （在此查询表达式中，"FieldName"表示的字段名称）：If the property is `true`, generates a WHERE clauses like the following (in this query expression, "FieldName" represents the name of the field): ``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ``` 如果字段是 false，生成以下 WHERE 子句：If for the field is false, generates the following WHERE clause: ``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ``` 此外，@IsNull_FieldName如果源字段包含 null 值和 0，如果它不包含 1。In addition, @IsNull_FieldName contains 1 if the source field contains null, and 0 if it does not. 此机制允许 SQL Server 中的一个性能优化，并提供的可以在多个提供程序的通用代码。This mechanism allows for a performance optimization in SQL Server, and provides for common code that works across multiple providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于输入参数的值绑定到，发送到服务器。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 对于输出参数和返回值参数，该数值将在完成后已关闭。For output and return value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 可以设置此属性为 null 或。This property can be set to null or . 使用以参数的值的形式发送一个 NULL 值。Use to send a NULL value as the value of the parameter. 使用 null，或者未设置若要将用于该参数的默认值。Use null or do not set to use the default value for the parameter. 如果应用程序指定数据库类型，绑定的值转换为该类型时提供程序将数据发送到服务器。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 提供程序尝试将任何类型的值的转换，如果它支持接口。The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的类型不兼容的值，可能会导致转换错误。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 同时和属性可以通过设置推断。Both the and properties can be inferred by setting the . 属性会被覆盖`SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`。The property is overwritten by `SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`. 使用属性以返回作为公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型的参数值。Use the property to return parameter values as common language runtime (CLR) types. 有关流式处理的信息，请参阅[SqlClient 流支持](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。For information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md).

summary.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.

span.span: An that is the value of the parameter.

value.span: 默认值为 null。

span.span: The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于输入参数的值绑定到，发送到服务器。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 对于输出参数和返回值参数，该数值将在完成后已关闭。For output and return value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 可以设置此属性为 null 或。This property can be set to null or . 使用以参数的值的形式发送一个 NULL 值。Use to send a NULL value as the value of the parameter. 使用 null，或者未设置若要将用于该参数的默认值。Use null or do not set to use the default value for the parameter. 如果非 Unicode XML 数据作为字符串传递，将引发异常。An exception is thrown if non-Unicode XML data is passed as a string. 如果应用程序指定数据库类型，绑定的值转换为该类型时提供程序将数据发送到服务器。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 提供程序尝试将任何类型的值的转换，如果它支持接口。The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的类型不兼容的值，可能会导致转换错误。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 同时和属性可以推断出的值设置。Both the and properties can be inferred by setting the Value. 属性会被覆盖`SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`。The property is overwritten by `SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand`. 有关流式处理的信息，请参阅[SqlClient 流支持](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md)。For information about streaming, see [SqlClient Streaming Support](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sqlclient-streaming-support.md). ## Examples 下面的示例创建并设置其属性的一些。The following example creates a and sets some of its properties. [!code-csharp[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/CS/source.cs#8)] [!code-vb[DataWorks SqlParam.Properties#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks SqlParam.Properties/VB/source.vb#8)]
